title: Change ScreenShot binding
body:
Trying to change keybinding for screenshots. Previously changed it to -. Now, I delete my input.ini file, create a new one with these two lines 
[GameEvents]
evtMakeScreenShot = [1]

and the binding is still set to -. Restarted lol as well. Help?

replies.body:
The input file pretty much absorbs info from your persisted settings.  Is it possible to apply it in persistedsettings instead?  We don't support modifications, so I'm going on a big guess here.

If you run into issues, you may need to reset your config before trying again:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
